TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Carmelo_Anthony, title = Carmelo_Anthony, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carmelo_Anthony} }

S.FORM: Carmelo Anthony tatama, lumeniay a banges, u Amilika kanatal a tademaw. unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Carmelo Anthony i 2003 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 3, namapili' tu nu Denver Nuggets putiput. 5 bulad 29 demiad, 1984 a mihca, Carmelo Anthony, miunduay.

Carmelo Anthony tatama, lomeniay a banges, o Amilika kanatal a tademaw. ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Carmelo Anthony i 2003 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 3, namapili' to no Denver Noggets potipot. 5 bolad 29 demiad, 1984 a mihca, Carmelo Anthony, miondoay.
